description: This file implements functions related to cryptographic key generation, specifically for RSA and DSA keys, using OpenSSL DSA parameter generation. It provides a function to generate DSA key pairs with placeholder implementations for RSA and DSA, and a real implementation for DSA key generation via OpenSSL.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayGenKeyPairRandomly(ANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_TYPE keyType,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_GEN_PARAMS pParams,ULONG ulKeyOctets)
methods.description: Generates a cryptographic key pair (RSA or DSA) with placeholder logic, currently supporting only key type validation without actual key generation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayGenRSAKeyPairRandomly(ANSC_CRYPTO_PRIME * pPublicKey,ANSC_CRYPTO_PRIME * pPrivateKey,ULONG ulKeyOctets)
methods.description: Stub function intended to generate RSA key pairs, currently a placeholder returning success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayGenDSAKeyPairRandomly(ANSC_CRYPTO_PRIME * pPublicKey,ANSC_CRYPTO_PRIME * pPrivateKey,ULONG ulKeyOctets)
methods.description: Generates a DSA key pair using OpenSSL's DSA_generate_parameters function based on a fixed seed, returning success if generation is successful.
